shortdesc.ph: Sets the subscription options for the remote video stream.
Sets the subscription options for remote video streams.
Sets the subscription options for the remote video stream.

p.codeblock: Future<void> setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx( {required int uid, required VideoSubscriptionOptions options, required RtcConnection connection});
public abstract int SetRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx(uint uid, VideoSubscriptionOptions options, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: When the remote user sends dual streams, you can call this method to set the subscription options for the remote video stream.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
